desc: Imaginatively shaped sculptural designs by award-winning artist, Ann Morhauser, and her team of artisans offer elegant mixes of colors and transparent glass embedded with lush 24-karat gold and platinum. Additional location in Watsonville.

At this bustling wharf, sample fresh seafood at any of several restaurants, shop for souvenirs or even take a whale-watching tour with a boat charter company.
